author: Simon Difford
description: To quote from the Oxford English Dictionary, "This is done with the help of the hands of consciousness that extend from the spiritual heart and are coessential to it". It is and John Coe did. Thanks again John, this delicate but aromatic drink is dedicated to you.
name: Coessential
recipeIngredient: 15 ml White cr√®me de cacao liqueur

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
